bdi4jade.reasoning

Class DefaultOptionGenerationFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdi4jade.reasoning.AbstractReasoningStrategy
      • bdi4jade.reasoning.DefaultOptionGenerationFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionGenerationFunction, ReasoningStrategy

    public class DefaultOptionGenerationFunction
extends AbstractReasoningStrategy
implements OptionGenerationFunction
    This class is the default implementation of the strategy OptionGenerationFunction. No goal is dropped or created.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes

      • DefaultOptionGenerationFunction

        public DefaultOptionGenerationFunction()

    • Method Detail

      • generateGoals

        public void generateGoals(GoalUpdateSet goalUpdateSet)
        This performs no action, that is, it is an empty implementation. Therefore, no goal from the current goal set of the GoalUpdateSet remains as goals, and no goal is dropped or created.
        Specified by:
        generateGoals in interface OptionGenerationFunction
        Parameters:
        goalUpdateSet - a three-set object containing current goals with their status, and dropped and generated goals.
        See Also:
        OptionGenerationFunction.generateGoals(GoalUpdateSet)
